summary: This is an arrest warrant issued by the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York for Ghislaine Maxwell. It commands law enforcement to arrest her for charges including conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual named in the arrest warrant, accused of multiple federal crimes related to the enticement and transportation of minors, and perjury.

persons.name: Lisa Margaret Smith
persons.context: The issuing officer who signed the arrest warrant for Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Arrest Warrant Issued for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A U.S. magistrate judge issues an arrest warrant for Ghislaine Maxwell on federal charges including conspiracy and acts related to the enticement and transportation of minors, and perjury.

locations: United States District Court for the Southern District of New York
keyFacts: An arrest warrant was issued for Ghislaine Maxwell on June 29, 2020.
The warrant was issued by U.S. Magistrate Judge Lisa Margaret Smith in White Plains, NY.
The charges listed are conspiracy to entice minors, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury.
The document is a formal court command for law enforcement to arrest Ghislaine Maxwell.
The case is filed in the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York.
